welcomePage.title: Pliny
welcomePage.intro: This page will help familiarize you with the the Pliny Note Manager. To get started, read the sections below and click on the related links.
welcomePage.item: Introduction to Pliny The Pliny Note Manager is a tool intended to help you create and manage notes about things that you read. To learn more about Pliny check Pliny's help pages.

Pliny's tutorials Several tutorials about how to use Pliny are included in the help pages. If this is your first exposure to Pliny I would suggest that you take a look at these. They can be found in Pliny's tutorial pages.

Pliny's Perspective If you are using Pliny from within Eclipse (rather than "standalone"), it is best used within its own Eclipse "perspective". (The term "perspective" is used here in the Eclipse sense: as a screen layout). You can launch it by clicking here.
